entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
